title: [FR] Driver's License
long_description:
# [FR]Driver's License Benefit Details 
[FR]Brief description of the Driver's License Benefit 
## [FR]Overview 
[FR]Short Overview of Driver's License Process 
## [FR]Important Information 
[FR]Important Information cli8ents need to know for the Driver's License benefit. 
## [FR]Eligibility criteria 
[FR]Description of Driver's License Eligibility Criteria and how to qualify for the benefit. 
- [FR]Must be 16 years of age or older 
- [FR]Must be a resident of Canada 
- [FR]Must have completed a Driver Training Program 
- [FR]For client's under the age of 18, you must have parental consent 
### [FR]Examples 
[FR]Description of different scenario's to provide examples to clients 
## [FR]Eligibility period 
[FR]Description of Eligibility periods for a Driver's License. 
## [FR]How to apply 
[FR]Description of How to apply for a Driver's License and what information is required. 
## [FR]Contact Information 
[FR]For further Information on Driver's License and related Benefits contact 1-800-Drivers. 
## [FR]Payment Information 
Description of Payment Information for a Driver's License.

title: [FR] Senior's Card
long_description:
# [FR]Senior card Benefit Details 
[FR]Brief description of the Senior card Benefit 
## [FR]Overview 
[FR]Short Overview of Senior card Process 
## [FR]Important Information 
[FR]Important Information cli8ents need to know for the Senior card benefit. 
## [FR]Eligibility criteria 
[FR]Description of Senior card Eligibility Criteria and how to qualify for the benefit. 
- [FR]Must be over 55 years of age 
- [FR]Must be a resident of Canada 
- [FR]Must be retired 
### [FR]Examples 
[FR]Description of different scenario's to provide examples to clients

[FR]Description of Eligibility periods for a Senior card.

[FR]Description of How to apply for a Senior card and what information is required. 
## [FR]Contact Information 
[FR]For further Information on Senior card and related Benefits contact 1-800-seniors. 
## [FR]Payment Information 
[FR]Description of Payment Information for a Senior card.

## [FR]Overview 
[FR]Short Overview of Disability card Process 
## [FR]Important Information

## [FR]Eligibility criteria 
[FR]Description of Disability card Eligibility Criteria and how to qualify for the benefit.

- [FR]Must be a resident of Canada
